response:
Welcome to the Ola service subscription module. We offer two tiers of subscription plans: Ola Care and Ola Care Plus. These plans provide peace of mind with benefits like annual comprehensive scooter diagnostic, towing, puncture assist, theft assistance, and more, all free of charge. 

With Ola Care Plus, enjoy additional benefits like free home service, pick up and drop, free consumables, and 24/7 doctor and ambulance service. Our theft assistance service provides a dedicated helpline and we guide you through the process and documentation. 

We also offer extended warranty plans for your Ola S1 and S1 Pro, extending your original three-year manufacturer warranty to five years. Choose from Comprehensive extended warranty or Battery only extended warranty. 

Enhance your Ola experience with our accessories like center stand, buddy step, and scooter cover. Purchase them easily from our website or app. 

Join the Ola revolution with our graphic printed T-shirts, available for order from our website or app. 

In summary, this module covers Ola service subscription offerings, extended warranty, Ola accessories, and merchandise. Thank you.
